login.description: To fully enjoy the application and its features, you are invited to log in with your personal account.
login.headline:
Log or sign in
to unlock more features
login.title: Let's get acquainted

logout.description:
To protect your data, we invite you to fully log out from your personal space.
If you encounter any technical issues, you can also be logged out by getting out right now.
logout.forceLogout: Get out of here right now
logout.title: Log out

onDisconnected.fail: You have been logged out due to security reasons

onUnauthenticated.description: Discover more features by logging in with your personal account.
onUnauthenticated.title: Wanna see more?
